video.headline: Donchenko prevails with a first-round TKO
video.caption: Daniil Donchenko knocks out Rodrigo Sezinando with a big right hand to pick up a round one win.
video.title: Donchenko prevails with a first-round TKO
video.description: Daniil Donchenko knocks out Rodrigo Sezinando with a big right hand to pick up a round one win.

video.headline: Coria defeats Costa via TKO

video.headline: Rafa Garcia wins by TKO over Jared Gordon
video.caption: Rafa Garcia drops Jared Gordon with a brutal right hand, then works him on the ground until the ref calls the fight.
video.title: Rafa Garcia wins by TKO over Jared Gordon
video.description: Rafa Garcia drops Jared Gordon with a brutal right hand, then works him on the ground until the ref calls the fight.

video.headline: Diego Lopes uses huge spinning back elbow to KO Jean Silva
video.caption: Diego Lopes drops Jean Silva with a spinning back elbow, then unleashes a flurry of punches to stop the fight.
